response.overview: Want to learn how to bang out the tunes like Jerry Lee Lewis? Well, your prayers have been answered — the Totally Interactive Keyboard Bible is the most comprehensive keyboard resource available! The Totally Interactive Keyboard Bible brings together four fully-integrated components packaged with a deluxe easel: • The DVD includes a full-length documentary showcasing classic keyboards (all the great makes and models) as well as the greatest players of all time. See and hear keyboard-driven music as you’ve never heard it before!
response.title: Totally Interactive Keyboard Bible
